function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of anthropogenic activities leading to improved water quality","Impact":"Decreased contamination of surface and groundwater","Mitigation":"Maintaining water quality without relying on lockdowns","Technologies":"Water treatment technologies, pollution monitoring systems","People":"Population near water sources","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Decrease in tourism activities leading to improved water quality in Venice","Impact":"Reduced pollution and sediment concentration in the lagoon of Venice","Mitigation":"Sustainable tourism practices, pollution control measures","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, sediment filtration technologies","People":"Residents and tourists in Venice","Owner":"Local government, tourism industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Reduction in agricultural and industrial activities leading to improved groundwater quality in Tuticorin, India","Impact":"Decreased chemical and bacterial pollutants in groundwater","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable agricultural and industrial practices, monitoring groundwater quality","Technologies":"Groundwater monitoring systems, sustainable farming techniques","People":"Residents of Tuticorin, agricultural and industrial workers","Owner":"Local government, agricultural and industrial organizations"}]}
